      Add any number of tags to a DbxFile

      • add

        @POST
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response add(de.rueckert.task.entity.DbxFile dbxFile)
                                    throws com.dropbox.core.v2.files.GetMetadataErrorException,
                                           com.dropbox.core.DbxException,
                                           org.apache.solr.client.solrj.SolrServerException,
                                           java.io.IOException
        Add any number of tags to a DbxFile
        Use pathLower attribute of a dropbox file to specify which dropbox file you want to tag as a path in json payload
        Enter list of tags (separated with comma) you want to add to a dropbox file
        Parameters:
        dbxFile - payload in folloing format:
        '{ \ "path": ""/some_lower_path_of_a_dropbox_dile", \ "tags": [ \ "tag1",\ "tag2" \ ] \ }
        Returns:
        saved DbxFile as a json
        Throws:
        com.dropbox.core.v2.files.GetMetadataErrorException
        com.dropbox.core.DbxException
        org.apache.solr.client.solrj.SolrServerException
        java.io.IOException

        folder, - specify * to retrieve all files in a root folder, otherwise, specify valid dropbox folder path

      • removeTags

        @PUT
 @Path(value="remove-tags")
public de.rueckert.task.entity.DbxFile removeTags(de.rueckert.task.entity.DbxFile dbxFile)
                                                                            throws org.apache.solr.client.solrj.SolrServerException,
                                                                                   java.io.IOException
        Use this method to remove tags from a DbxFile stored in solr. Specify in DbxFile json payload unique file path you want to remove the tags from. This json must contain only the tags you want to remove.
        Parameters:
        dbxFile - payload in folloing format:
        '{ \ "path": ""/some_lower_path_of_a_dropbox_dile", \ "tags": [ \ "tagToRemove1",\ "tagToRemove2" \ ] \ }
        Returns:
        updated DbxFile as a json
        Throws:
        org.apache.solr.client.solrj.SolrServerException
        java.io.IOException

      • search_dbx

        @GET
 @Path(value="search-dbx")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public java.util.List search_dbx(@QueryParam(value="tags")
                                                                                                      java.util.List<java.lang.String> tags,
                                                                                                      @QueryParam(value="offset")
                                                                                                      int offset,
                                                                                                      @QueryParam(value="range")
                                                                                                      int range,
                                                                                                      @QueryParam(value="operator")
                                                                                                      java.lang.String operator)
                                                                                               throws com.dropbox.core.DbxApiException,
                                                                                                      com.dropbox.core.DbxException,
                                                                                                      org.apache.solr.client.solrj.SolrServerException,
                                                                                                      java.io.IOException
        Search file by specific tags
        Parameters:
        tags - specify tags you want to search by (must be at least one)
        offset - optional parameter used for pagination, enter positive numeric value here, if left empty fallbacks to 0
        range - optional parameter used for pagination, enter positive numeric value here, if left empty fallbacks to 10
        operator - optional boolean operator, possible values are OR and AND, if left empty fallbacks to OR
        Returns:
        List of found dropbox file object represented in a json
        Throws:
        com.dropbox.core.DbxApiException
        com.dropbox.core.DbxException
        org.apache.solr.client.solrj.SolrServerException
        java.io.IOException

      • search

        @GET
 @Path(value="search")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public java.util.List search(@QueryParam(value="tags")
                                                                                              java.util.List<java.lang.String> tags,
                                                                                              @QueryParam(value="offset")
                                                                                              int offset,
                                                                                              @QueryParam(value="range")
                                                                                              int range,
                                                                                              @QueryParam(value="operator")
                                                                                              java.lang.String operator)
                                                                                       throws com.dropbox.core.DbxApiException,
                                                                                              com.dropbox.core.DbxException,
                                                                                              org.apache.solr.client.solrj.SolrServerException,
                                                                                              java.io.IOException
        Search file by specific tags
        Parameters:
        tags - specify tags you want to search by (must be at least one)
        offset - optional parameter used for pagination, enter positive numeric value here, if left empty fallbacks to 0
        range - optional parameter used for pagination, enter positive numeric value here, if left empty fallbacks to 10
        operator - optional boolean operator, possible values are OR and AND, if left empty fallbacks to OR
        Returns:
        List of found DbxFiles in solr
        Throws:
        com.dropbox.core.DbxApiException
        com.dropbox.core.DbxException
        org.apache.solr.client.solrj.SolrServerException
        java.io.IOException
